amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete funding of $121.8 million for construction of missile silos at Fort Greeley, Alaska.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the appropriation for "Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide" by $121,800,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tierney amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 112 - 314 (Roll no. 269).
